page.title: 08Farming
page.content: Mr Tinkers farm is 170 acre 75% grass 25% barley. Mr Tinkers farm consists of an Ayrshire bull, 80 Ayrshire cows, Charolais cows, 3 sheep and a dog. The oldest cow is 12 years old. The youngest calf was 1 day old. The milking parlour consists of 16 milking machines but he uses only 8 machines. Whole the milking is made up of tiles, steel, stainless steel, concrete, wood, rubber, plastic, glass, brass and perspet glass. Mr Wilkinsons farm is 8o acre big 40% buildings 60% grass. His farm consists of pigs, sheep and hens and 5 dogs 4 piglets, 80 sows, 3 boars, a Large White, a Norwegian Landrace and a Cambra. A Cambra pig consists of all different breeds of pig. There are ten sheep, ten Cheviots.
